title: User Experience Designer
description:
**Project Role :** User Experience Designer  

**Project Role Description :** Analyze the needs of the target users and how they perform tasks to create an optimized user experience.
  

**Must have skills :** User Experience (UX) Design  

**Good to have skills :** NA  

Minimum **5** year(s) of experience is required  

**Educational Qualification :** BTech  

  

Summary: As a User Experience Designer, you will be responsible for analyzing the needs of the target users and how they perform tasks to create an optimized user experience. Your typical day will involve interacting with multiple stakeholders like Business Analyst, Product owner to translate the requirements to clickable prototype. Roles & Responsibilities: - Design and develop mock screens/wireframes for web and mobile applications using user-centered design principles. - Create wireframes, prototypes, and user flows to effectively communicate design ideas. - Develop and maintain design wireframes, mockups, and specifications as needed. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, developers, and designers, to ensure a seamless user experience. - Create and maintain a design system that ensures consistency across all products and platforms. - Design and deliver user-centered design solutions that meet business goals and user needs. Professional & Technical Skills: - Must To Have Skills: Strong experience in User Experience (UX) Design. - Good To Have Skills: Experience with user research methodologies, wireframing and prototyping tools, and design thinking methodologies. - Solid understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices. - Experience with design and prototyping tools such as Sketch, Figma, or Adobe XD. - Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively present design ideas and solutions to stakeholders. Additional Information: - The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in User Experience (UX) Design. - The JOB FAMILY and PROJECT ROLE information are not for candidate's experience. - This position is based at our Bengaluru office.


  

BTech

title: Experience Designer
description:
**Role** – Experience Designer (UX)  

**Location** Hyderabad


We are looking for an Interface Designer to join our mobile game team. The UI/UX Designer will collaborate with team leads to create improved player experiences for Covet Fashion. This includes working on existing features through wireframes, prototypes, and animation, working with existing and new UI assets, icons, and in-game graphics, and implementing UI in Cocos Creator. The UI/UX Designer will work closely with the Art Leads, Product Managers, and Engineers on features and be a talented in-house art team member.


**What you’ll be doing:**


* Gathering product, technical, and user requirements to design features, creating delightful experiences for the audience.
* Rapidly iterating and implementing feedback to help finalize designs.
* Creating UI mockups with existing assets while working with the Art Lead to evolve the look and feel of the product.
* Implementing new UI elements in Cocos Creator, working closely with engineers to troubleshoot issues, and seeing designs through to completion in the game.
* Attending daily scrums, helping generate task lists based on specs, tracking work in Jira tickets, and following up with the Art Lead and Producer on tasks and schedules.
* Help to shape the UI design system to ensure players enjoy the game while navigating its interface.
* Provide high-fidelity UI screens and components that align with the product's experience goals, brand, usability, and accessibility standards.
* Communicate progress and project plans with the leadership team and other partners.

  

  

**You’ll be a great fit if you have the following:**


At least three years of working as a UI/UX Designer for mobile games or similar digital products  

* Excellent graphic design skills, including iconography and creating in-game marketing assets
* Creative thinking and problem-solving skills
* Proficiency in Photoshop, Adobe XD or Sketch
* Love of creative collaboration and ability to take direction well
* A passion for creating great entertainment products for women

  

We are a global team of creators, storytellers, technologists, experience originators, innovators and so much more. We believe amazing games and experiences start with teams as diverse as the players and communities we serve. At Electronic Arts, the only limit is your imagination.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
**Who We Are:**



HighLevel is an all-in-one, white-label marketing platform for agencies & consultants. Our goal as a business is to create a sustainable, powerful, “all things marketing” operating system that creates limitless opportunities for our customers. With over 60,000 customers, we need people like YOU to help us grow and scale even further in the coming years.

  

We currently have 800+ employees worldwide, working remotely as well as in our headquarters, which is located in Dallas, Texas.

  

Our goal as an employer is to maintain a strong company culture, foster creativity and collaboration, and, above all, encourage a healthy work-life balance for our employees wherever they call home!

 **Who You Are:**  

As a Graphic Designer, you will utilize your skills and experience to edit, create and even design high quality social media and marketing campaigns. You will be integral to conceptualizing major campaigns, developing visual direction, collaborating with marketing and content teams to turn ideas into reality.

 **What You’ll Be Doing:**


* Visually design marketing campaigns, including web, social and digital advertising media.
* Design performance marketing assets that also push the brand forward in a meaningful way.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ideate and create beautiful designs to support our product and marketing efforts.
* Brainstorm and generate concepts with the team based on marketing initiatives.
* Working with influencers and other content creators/specialist to align with our ever-changing business and customer needs.
* Will perform additional responsibilities when required

  


**What You’ll Bring:**  

To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.
  

  

**Experience/Education/Certifications Required:**


* **Must be available to permanently work US hours. 9:00am - 6:00pm Monday - Friday CST (which would be Mon-Fri 11pm-7am Philippine time or Mon- Fri 8:30pm-5:30am IST if the candidate is based in India).**
* BA in Design or Art-related field; or relevant experience.
* 3 years of experience in Adobe Suite preferred.
* Knowledgeable and experienced working in Adobe Creative Cloud.
* Have basic & navigational knowledge of MAC and Google products.
* Must be able to deliver quality designs in a fast-paced environment.
* Excellent time management and keen attention to detail.
* Creativity and great listening skills are a must for this position.
* Must be able to adapt to a remote environment and communicate consistently with global teams.
* High degree of initiative, self-motivation and ability to motivate others.
* Ability to provide a working atmosphere that is positive and productive.
* Ability to establish and maintain cooperative working relationships with team members.
* A portfolio of previous graphics creation work.

  


**EEO Statement:**



At HighLevel, we value diversity. In fact, we understand it makes our organization stronger. We are committed to inclusive hiring/promotion practices that evaluate skill sets, abilities and qualifications without regard to any characteristic unrelated to performing the job at the highest level. Our objective is to foster an environment where really talented employees from all walks of life can be their true and whole selves, cherished and welcomed for their differences, while providing awesome service to our clients and learning from one another along the way!



Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

title: Lead UI/UX Designer - India
description:
**FoundingTeams.ai** is a new AI Tech Incubator and talent platform. We are supporting the next generation of AI startup founders with the resources they need including engineering, product, sales, marketing, and operations staff to create and launch their products.

The ideal candidate will have a passion for next-generation AI tech startups and working with great global startup talent.

**Job Title:** - Lead UI/UX Designer

**Company**: Stealth AI Startup

**Remote**: 16-20 hours per week.

**Flexible hours :** Yes

**Job Description:**

As a UI (User Interface) Designer, your primary responsibility is to create visually appealing and intuitive interfaces for digital products such as websites, mobile apps, and software applications. You will work closely with cross-functional teams including UX designers, developers, and product managers to ensure the final product meets both user needs and business objectives.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **UI Design:** Designing user interfaces for various digital platforms while adhering to design principles, brand guidelines, and industry best practices.
* **Wireframing and Prototyping:** Creating wireframes and prototypes to illustrate design concepts and interactions, allowing for user testing and iteration.
* **Visual Design:** Developing visually engaging graphics, icons, and other visual elements to enhance the user experience and brand identity.
* **Typography and Color Theory:** Applying typography and color theory principles to create harmonious and readable interfaces that convey the desired mood and message.
* **Responsive Design:** Ensuring designs are responsive and adaptable across different devices and screen sizes for a consistent user experience.
* **Collaboration:** Collaborating with UX designers, developers, and other stakeholders throughout the design process to gather feedback, refine designs, and ensure feasibility of implementation.
* **User Research:** Working closely with UX researchers to understand user needs, behaviors, and preferences, and incorporating findings into design decisions.
* **Usability Testing:** Conducting usability testing sessions or analyzing user feedback to identify areas for improvement and iterate on designs accordingly.
* **Documentation:** Creating design specifications, style guides, and other documentation to facilitate smooth handoffs to development teams and ensure design consistency.
* **Stay Updated:** Keeping abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies, and design tools to continuously improve skills and stay competitive in the field.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, or related field (or equivalent experience).
* Proven experience as a UI Designer or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing UI design projects.
* Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe XD, Sketch, Figma, or similar software.
* Solid understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and visual hierarchy.
* Experience with responsive design and familiarity with front-end development technologies (HTML, CSS, etc.).
* Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to articulate design decisions and incorporate feedback effectively.
* Attention to detail and a passion for creating exceptional user experiences.

**Note:** This job description may vary depending on the specific requirements and preferences of the hiring organization.

Job Types: Full-time, Part-time

Salary: ₹4,144,015.00 per year

Schedule:

* Monday to Friday

Work Location: Remote

title: Junior Product Designer
description:
Responsibilities
  
  

1. Collaborate with the product design team to understand and translate the UX vision into compelling UI designs.
  
2. Collaborate with Product Managers to solve usability issues by designing intuitive, user-centered experiences, focusing on workflows and interaction models.
  
3. Create high-fidelity prototypes and design assets using Figma.
  
4. Participate in user research and usability testing to gather feedback and iterate on design solutions.
  
5. Collaborate with front-end developers to establish and refine a design system, enhancing the efficiency and consistency of our product development process, and ultimately contributing to faster product shipping.
  
6. Work across multiple products, managing your time effectively to meet deadlines and project goals.
  
7. Communicate clearly and effectively with team members across different departments, ensuring alignment and understanding of design decisions.
  
8. Stay up-to-date with the latest design trends, techniques, and technologies.
  
  

Requirements
  
  

1. 1-3 years of demonstrated experience in product design.
  
2. A portfolio showcasing strong design skills (both UX and UI), in a case study format.
  
3. Proficiency in designing and prototyping with Figma.
  
4. Basic understanding of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) or experience with no/low-code tools, with a willingness to learn and apply these skills in a product context.
  
5. Ability to work closely with developers to understand technical constraints and collaborate on feasible design solutions.
  
6. Strong problem-solving skills and a keen eye for detail.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
**Job Description:**

We are looking for a highly skilled and imaginative Graphic Designer who is proficient in translating creative concepts into visually stunning designs. The ideal candidate will have a keen eye for detail, a strong understanding of design principles, and the ability to meet project objectives while maintaining brand consistency. The Graphic Designer will collaborate with our multidisciplinary team, including copywriters, marketing strategists, and account managers, to deliver high-quality visual assets that captivate and engage our target audience.

**Responsibilities:**

**Conceptualise and Create Visual Assets:** Develop innovative and visually appealing designs for various marketing materials, including but not limited to print and digital advertisements, social media graphics, brochures, presentations, and promotional collateral.

**Brand Consistency:** Ensure that all design elements align with the brand guidelines of clients and the agency, maintaining a consistent and cohesive visual identity across all platforms.

**Collaboration:** Work closely with cross-functional teams, including copywriters and marketing strategists, to understand project requirements and contribute creative insights.

**Adaptability:** Stay updated on industry trends and design software to bring fresh and cutting-edge ideas to the table. Be adaptable to changing project requirements and timelines.

**Project Management:** Manage multiple projects simultaneously, from conception to completion, ensuring deadlines are met and client expectations are exceeded.

**Client Interaction:** Participate in client meetings to present design concepts, gather feedback, and make necessary revisions to meet client expectations.

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, or a related field.
* Proven experience as a Graphic Designer in an advertising or marketing agency.
* Proficiency in industry-standard design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite: Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
* Strong portfolio showcasing a range of design work, including both digital and print materials.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
* Detail-oriented with a passion for creativity and design.

**How to Apply:**

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume, cover letter, and a link to their portfolio to hr@squashglobal.com. Please include "Graphic Designer Application" in the subject line.

description:

**Good to have skills :** NA  

Minimum **5** year(s) of experience is required

Summary: As a User Experience Designer, you will be responsible for analyzing the needs of the target users and how they perform tasks to create an optimized user experience. Your typical day will involve interacting with multiple stakeholders like Business Analyst, Product owner to translate the requirements to clickable prototype. Roles & Responsibilities: - Design and develop mock screens/wireframes for web and mobile applications using user-centered design principles. - Create wireframes, prototypes, and user flows to effectively communicate design ideas. - Develop and maintain design wireframes, mockups, and specifications as needed. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, developers, and designers, to ensure a seamless user experience. - Create and maintain a design system that ensures consistency across all products and platforms. - Design and deliver user-centered design solutions that meet business goals and user needs. Professional & Technical Skills: - Must To Have Skills: Strong experience in User Experience (UX) Design. - Good To Have Skills: Experience with user research methodologies, wireframing and prototyping tools, and design thinking methodologies. - Solid understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices. - Experience with design and prototyping tools such as Sketch, Figma, or Adobe XD. - Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively present design ideas and solutions to stakeholders. Additional Information: - The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in User Experience (UX) Design. - The JOB FAMILY and PROJECT ROLE information are not for candidate's experience. - This position is based at our Bengaluru office.

title: Tech Lead - JavaScript (Pune)
description:
Full-time

  
**Company Description**
-----------------------


We are a leading technology and design company that stays ahead of the curve, with over a decade of experience. We offer business-to-business solutions that create engaging digital experiences for enterprises across industries. Our solutions are built on development expertise, design thinking, and innovative technologies. We follow an agile methodology to deliver exceptional user experiences. Our creative solutions have an intuitive user experience and produce measurable results.  

  

Our team of experts in development, design, and technology posses diverse skill sets, including Drupal development, UX/UI design, quality engineering, JavaScript frameworks, content strategy, branding, product engineering, artificial intelligence, and machine learning.  

We believe in the pursuit of excellence, building strong partnerships, taking ownership of our work, and embracing feedback every step of the way. We prioritize the personal and professional success of our team members. Our culture is centered around connecting design, code, and our values to make a meaningful impact across the world.  

  

We deliver digital excellence by being rooted in our values and principles, including taking charge, excellence, cohesion, coherence, kindness, boldness, and creativity.


Join us https://www.qed42.com/careers

**Job Description**
-------------------


The Javascript Technical Lead is a demonstrated thought leader in technical and/or functional aspects of customer and partner engagements that lead to the successful delivery of Javascript projects at QED42.  

The Javascript Technical Lead plays a critical role in setting customers up for success by prescriptively helping to shape and then lead the project teams within the Javascript space.  

This role also provides the Professional Services team with subject matter expertise related to the proposed solution and client needs to ensure successful project delivery. This includes helping to identify and proactively manage risk areas and ensuring issues are seen through to complete resolution. Will have the ability to configure and drive solutions, while mentoring the project team to meet the customers' business and technical requirements.

**Responsibilities :**

* To lead the development and deployment of web applications, focusing on the use of **JavaScript** and **Next.js** for front-end development, along with **Node.js** for the back-end.
* Architect and implement full-stack solutions, integrating front-end, back-end, and databases seamlessly.
* Design scalable, secure, and cost-efficient cloud-based solutions on **AWS**, leveraging services such as **EC2**, **S3**, **Lambda**, **Amplify**, and **RDS**.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality solutions.
* Uphold code quality and sustainability through rigorous code reviews, unit testing, and deployment automation.
* Stay updated with the latest trends in technology, particularly around JavaScript frameworks, AWS cloud services, and full-stack development practices.
* Mentor and support junior developers, promoting a culture of learning and growth within the team.
* Must have a passion for building great developer experiences, have high energy, and be capable of thriving in a high-paced and fun work environment.
* Serve as the **Subject Matter Expert** for Javascript at QED42
* When engaged with customers, assist with team leadership and help/exceed goals and metrics while providing insight into Javascript best practices
* Coordinate monthly practice meetings to encourage and share knowledge with members of the team
* Engage in continued, self-directed professional growth and development
* Deliver high client satisfaction by ensuring value is realized through each engagement, helping customers realize and execute a 1:1 marketing vision that unifies a customer's experience on the Web and mobile.
* Inspire people to do the best work of their careers by being a multiplier, amplifying the knowledge and capability of the people around you while continuing to provide an inclusive workplace as one of the Best Places to Work.
**Qualifications**
------------------

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, engineering, or related fields.
* **7+ years** of experience in full-stack development, with a significant focus on **JavaScript**, especially **Next.js**, and **Node.js.**
* Demonstrated expertise in **AWS cloud architecture** and is familiar with deploying scalable and efficient solutions.
* Proficient in **RESTful API** development and have experience with database technologies (**SQL & NoSQL**).
* Solid understanding of **CI/CD** pipelines and version control systems (e.g., **Git**).
* Experience with **ES6**, **React.js** (SSR & CSR), **Next.js 12/13+**, **Node.js**, **Express**, **MongoDB**, **React Native,** and **GraphQL**.
* Problem-solving ability and a keen eye for detail.
* Comfort and ability to learn new technologies quickly & thoroughly
* Specializes in gathering and analyzing information related to web and data integration, real-time interactions, and customer use cases
* Excellent knowledge of Enterprise Design Patterns
* Good with Agile concepts and processes
* Demonstrated ability to influence a group audience, facilitate solutions and lead discussions such as implementation methodology, Road-mapping, Enterprise Transformation strategy, and executive-level requirement-gathering sessions
* Exceptional leadership, teamwork, and communication skills.

**Good to have (plus, but not mandatory):**

* Experience working with hybrid mobile application frameworks like **React** **Native** & **Flutter**.
* Experience working with a headless CMS like **Strapi**.
* Experience working with visualizations & dashboards with large data sets.
* Experience working with **Python** building APIs & AI applications/integrations.
**Additional Information**
--------------------------

**What you will get:**

* Open and collaborative work environment, where you will be challenged, respected, and valued for your merits.
* Intense experience in Drupal development which would bring your game to a whole other level.
* Strong leadership and mentoring, a clear career path, and a supportive environment.
* A company that is proud of the quality of its work and invested in your personal development and well-being.
* A team that values openness, does its job well, cares about one another, values customers, and plays fair
* People who are fun to work with, are invested in each other's growth and take the values seriously.
* Flexible work schedule as long as you uphold your commitments to the team and clients.
* Competitive salary, insurance, and lots of perks.

title: Senior UI/UX Designer
description:
About Info Edge  

InfoEdge’s mission is to create world-class platforms that transform lives by continuously innovating. Our products and services are built keeping our customers in mind. We always delight our customers by delivering superior value through enhanced offerings on the internet and other platforms. Through our continuous investment across various businesses, especially in cutting-edge technology, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI), we have built a robust system that constantly increases our predictive powers on customer behaviour, and optimizes and improves our systems. Our various teams tirelessly work together to solve problems, innovate, and create something to empower our customers.  

At Info Edge, people are our core competitive advantage and we will continue doing all that is needed to attract and retain the best available talent.  

About BU: Corporate Function  

Title: Associate UX Designer  

Desired Experience: 0-1 Years  

Required Educational Qualification: B.Des (e.g interaction, graphic, visual communication)/ Any graduation with a strong design portfolio  

Job Objective: As UX designer, you will be dedicated to simplifying the business and end user goals, and Impact life of millions of users on our platform. Our UX designers research, discover, and create solutions for business problems through deep understanding of the end users.  

Job Description:  

As Associate UX designer you will:  

* Create user-centered designs by considering market segment analysis, customer feedback, site metrics, and usability findings.
* Quickly and iteratively create interaction flows, wireframes, and visual design mock-ups throughout the design process.
* Drive the design review cycle, close on design requirements and interact with product managers and understand product priorities and needs.
* Design the visual style, interface, and interaction flow of applications and experiences. Maintain detailed user-interface specifications and design patterns.
* Come up with solutions that can fulfill the user needs without compromising the business goals.
* Identify the best and minimum viable features sets to be designed to give optimum user experience.
* Work closely with the product/research team and users to validate the need and usability of designed features.


Required Skills:  

* Ability to create great user-centered design solutions across desktop and mobile devices (flows, prototypes, wireframes) and solid visual designs.
* Fluency in best practices for mobile and web-based information architecture and design, as well as strong knowledge of usability principles and techniques.
* Experience of working in a collaborative team and working directly with developers for implementation of designs.
* Excellent communication, presentation, interpersonal and analytical skills including the ability to communicate complex, interactive design concepts clearly and persuasively across different audiences and varying levels of the organization.
* Strong understanding of user research methodologies and practice.
* Positive, proactive attitude and enthusiasm for the hard work required to solve creative challenges.


Desired Skills:  

* Consumer focused internet experience, designing dynamic end-to-end online experiences or any mobile app/games design experience is a must.
* Significant contributions to web or mobile applications.
* Fast and Interactive Prototyping skills.
* Detailed and clear interaction design specifications.
* Demonstrated ability to present and defend design decisions.


Why Join us:  

This is a unique opportunity to work on innovative and disruptive technologies that are shaping the future of the industry. We are looking for candidates who are willing to work passionately in a fast-paced environment and are ready to enhance their skills by learning something new. Being a part of the InfoEdge team, you will be engaged in innovations, product development, integration with mobile and social media, technology, research and development, quality assurance, sales and marketing.

title: Design, INTERIOR 3D PRODUCT/ FURNITURE DESIGNER
description:
#### **Job Description:**


1. Conceptualization and Design:  

* Generate innovative ideas and concepts for interior spaces and products based on della.in website requirements and brand identity.
* Develop detailed design briefs, mood boards, and conceptual sketches to communicate design intent effectively.


2. 3D Modelling and Rendering:  

* Utilize 3D modelling software (e.g. VRay, 3ds Max, SketchUp) to create accurate and detailed models of interior spaces & product renders, furniture, fixtures, and other elements.
* Produce high-quality photorealistic renderings and visualizations of interior designs, ensuring they accurately represent materials, lighting, and spatial arrangements.


3. Material Selection and Specification:  

* Research and identify appropriate materials, finishes, and textures for interior elements based on design requirements, functionality.
* Specify materials and finishes in collaboration with suppliers and manufacturers, ensuring they meet quality standards and design specifications.


4. Collaboration and Communication:  

* Collaborate closely with interior designers, architects, engineers, and other stakeholders to integrate 3D designs into overall project plans.
* Communicate design ideas, concepts, and specifications effectively through verbal presentations, written documentation, and visual presentations.


5. Iterative Design and Feedback:  

* Participate in design reviews and iterations based on feedback from Management and internal teams.
* Iterate on designs to address feedback, optimize functionality, and improve visual impact while adhering to project timelines and constraints.


6. Quality Assurance and Documentation:  

* Conduct thorough quality assurance checks on 3D models, renderings, and visualizations to ensure accuracy, consistency, and adherence to design standards.
* Document design decisions, specifications, and revisions for future reference and collaboration.

#### **Job Expectations:**


* Bachelor’s degree in interior design, Product Design, Architecture, or related field.
* Proven experience (3 years) working as a 3D product designer, interior designer, or related role.
* Proficiency in 3D modelling software such as VRay, 3ds Max, SketchUp, etc.
* Strong understanding of design principles, spatial planning, and material selection.
* Excellent visual communication skills with the ability to create photorealistic renderings and visualizations.
* Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.
* Strong attention to detail and ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment.
* Portfolio showcasing relevant interior design projects and 3D renderings.


#### **Minimum Qualification:**


Degree in relevant field
#### **Minimum Job Experience:**


3- 5 years
#### **Reporting to:**


Head of Department
#### **Travel:**


Yes, as and when required.

title: Interior Designer
description:
**JOB DESCRIPTION**

**Role & responsibilities**

As an Interior Designer, you will be responsible for creating aesthetically pleasing and functional interior spaces that meet the needs and preferences of clients. You will collaborate with clients to understand their requirements, develop design concepts, select appropriate materials and furnishings, and oversee the implementation of the design plan. Your creativity, technical skills, and understanding of spatial design will be essential in transforming spaces into environments that enhance living, working, or leisure experiences.

**Key Responsibilities:**

**Client Consultation:** Meet with clients to understand their goals, preferences, and budget constraints. Gather information about the purpose of the space, desired aesthetics, and functional requirements.

**Presentation and Communication**: Present design concepts, plans, and proposals to clients using sketches, drawings, mood boards, and digital presentations. Communicate effectively with clients, contractors, and other project stakeholders to ensure clarity and alignment throughout the design process.

**Space Planning**: Determine the layout and organization of interior spaces, considering factors such as traffic flow, functionality, and accessibility. Create floor plans, elevations, and renderings to communicate design concepts to clients and stakeholders.

**Project Management**: Oversee the implementation of design plans, including coordinating with contractors, architects, and other professionals involved in the project. Monitor progress, resolve issues, and ensure that the design vision is realized within specified timelines and budget constraints.

**SOFTWARE SKILL:**

-Auto Cad –Sketchup -Enscape-MS-Excel -Power Point Presentation

**EXPERIENCE: 1-3 YERAS**

title: Senior UX Designer
description:
Embark on a transformative career journey with Valtech, a renowned leader in digital innovation and a pioneer in creating captivating user experiences. At the heart of our mission lies the drive to revolutionize how businesses interact with their audiences through cutting-edge digital solutions. We're in pursuit of an accomplished Senior UX Designer passionate about crafting intuitive and impactful user experiences. This role presents a golden opportunity to influence major brands globally and redefine user interaction across various digital platforms.

### **Key Responsibilities:**


The Senior UX Designer will be instrumental in shaping the user experience strategy for our diverse range of projects. Your role involves:

* Leading user experience design projects from conception to implementation, ensuring they meet client needs and brand standards.
* Conducting in-depth user research and testing to inform design decisions and create user-centric solutions.
* Collaborating with multidisciplinary teams including UI designers, developers, and project managers to create seamless and innovative digital experiences.
* Developing wireframes, user flows, interactive prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups to communicate design concepts effectively.
* Presenting design concepts and strategies to stakeholders, providing insights into user needs and behaviours.
* Keeping abreast of the latest UX trends, tools, and technologies to continue driving innovation within the team.
* Mentoring junior UX designers and promoting a culture of continuous learning and improvement within the design team.

### **Required Skills and Experience:**

* A minimum of 5 years’ experience in a UX design role, with a strong portfolio showcasing your design process and outcomes.
* Proficiency in design and prototyping tools such as Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma, and InVision.
* Demonstrable experience conducting user research, usability testing, and translating insights into design solutions.
* Strong communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate design decisions and user needs to various stakeholders.
* Experience working in agile development teams, with a solid understanding of responsive design and accessibility standards.
* A creative thinker with a problem-solving mindset and a passion for enhancing user satisfaction.
* A collaborative team player who thrives in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.

### **What we offer:**


You’ll be a member of the international Valtech Connected XP hub. Here, you and other experts form part of a growing team that works together closely to create a shared impact for some wonderful brands. We are proud of what we do and frequently you will be pushing the limits of innovation and creativity. We’ll also support your development through our internal Academy. So if you’re looking to work for major brands on challenging projects in a culture that prizes freedom and responsibility, get in touch.

*At Valtech, our goal is to create experiences that work and reach everyone. We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive workplace where every individual is given the resources and opportunities to flourish and reach their potential. You can learn more about our dedication to diversity and inclusion* *here**.*

*If you don't meet every requirement in our job description, we still encourage you to apply. We are always eager to meet individuals who are passionate and could potentially add great value to our team!*

title: Graphic Designer & Visualizer
description:
We are seeking a skilled Graphic Artist with a keen eye for creative design to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will possess expertise in crafting visually compelling content for various digital platforms, including social media, presentations, and user interfaces. Proficiency in utilizing AI tools for rapid design iterations is essential to excel in this role.

**Responsibilities**

* Conceptualize and execute visually stunning graphics tailored for social media platforms, ensuring brand consistency and engagement.
* Design captivating presentations and visual assets that effectively communicate complex ideas and information.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop user-friendly interfaces and enhance user experiences across digital platforms.
* Stay abreast of design trends, tools, and techniques to continually innovate and elevate the quality of visual content.
* Utilize AI tools and automation technologies to streamline design processes and optimize workflow efficiency.
* Translate creative briefs and conceptual ideas into polished visual designs that resonate with target audiences.
* Maintain a cohesive visual identity across all brand touchpoints while adhering to brand guidelines and standards.
* Iterate and refine designs based on feedback, ensuring alignment with project objectives and stakeholder expectations.
* Manage multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines and delivering high-quality work under pressure.
* Collaborate with internal stakeholders to brainstorm ideas, pitch concepts, and contribute to creative strategy discussions.

**Qualifications**

* Proven experience as a Graphic Artist, Graphic Designer, or similar role, with a strong portfolio showcasing creative design work across various digital platforms.
* Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and familiarity with AI-powered design tools (e.g., Dall-e, Adobe Sensei, more...).
* Solid understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and composition.
* Demonstrated ability to create visually compelling content optimized for social media engagement and user interaction.
* Excellent communication skills and the ability to articulate creative ideas and concepts effectively.
* Strong attention to detail and a meticulous approach to design execution.
* Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment, prioritize tasks, and adapt to evolving project requirements.
* Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Arts, Multimedia Design, or a related field (or equivalent professional experience).

title: Head Fashion Designer
description:
We are seeking a talented **Manager/Senior Manager - Fashion Designer (Head Role)** to join our team and lead the research and production of innovative clothing lines that align with current market trends.

As a Fashion Designer, you will have the exciting opportunity to travel to fashion events, analyze market data, and identify emerging fashion trends.

Collaborating with our team of skilled Designers and Marketers, you will translate these trends into captivating clothing products that resonate with our customers.

Your creative vision and expertise will play a crucial role in shaping our seasonal collections.

Join us in this dynamic role where you can showcase your passion for fashion and contribute to the success of our brand.

**Responsibilities**

**1. Fashion Forecasting**

* Analyze the market and monitor current fashion trends, collections, customer preferences and competitor activities.
* Identify target markets for designs, looking at factors such as age, gender, and socioeconomic status.
* Forecast fashion for the season and give guidelines to the stakeholders in design team.

**2. Apparel Design**

* Plan and create new designs post getting concept guidelines from creative head for look of the season/special collection/events etc.
* Set clearly defined guidelines and plan the design range as per sales budget.
* Ensure designs are at par with the current market trends and in line with brand philosophy.
* Ensure precise designs are offered in order to maintain high design success rate and achieve targets.
* Coordinate with Fabric Department, Pattern makers, Tailors, cutting masters etc for sample making and end to end coordination for final production.
* Provide creative direction to the brand by conceptualizing and developing range for different season.
* Ensure desirable level of design approval ratio and give regular feedback in order to make clear decisions on the design range.

**3. Innovation**

* Ensure seasonal freshness of the collections in tune with international benchmarks and trends to drive brand as an innovative fashion leader.
* Promote new concepts, designs, systems and out of the box thinking for product innovations and processes.

**4. Market Research**

* Analyze the market and monitor current fashion trends, collections, customer preferences and competitor activities for fashion forecasting and give broad direction to individual brands
* Create themes for different seasons and provide the season’s theme brief to the marketing and visual merchandizing team.

5. **Adherence to design calendar & SOP**

* Monitor the activities of the design team to ensure delivery of designs as per design calendar.

**Requirements and skills**

* Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Design from NIFT with 6 - 10 years of experience in
* Behavioral Skills Required: Good aesthetic sense, effective Communication skills, well organized and collaborative.
* Technical Skills Required: Well-versed with adobe Photoshop/ Illustrator/Coral draw, Innovative, ability to think strategically.
* Women’s western wear /casual wear experience is must / working experience in leading Export/Buying House with good design skills

**- CTC 24 lacs annual (negotiable)**

**Kindly share your resume and portfolio to us at hr-admin@saltattire.com**

-------------------

**UX/UI Designer**
==================


Bengaluru
Multiple Positions **Can you bring creative human-centred ideas to life and make great things happen beyond what meets the eye?**

We’re looking for a talent and likeminded Mid & Senior UX Designer with research experience, along with passion and skills to help us rid the world of crappy design – one project at a time. **Would you like to…*** Play a key role in projects by being responsible not only for designing outcomes but also participating in client conversations
* Perform hands-on work in projects, both at early concept stages and during detailed end-to-end implementation
* Support business development, including shaping and presenting proposals to potential clients

* Develop our digital design capabilities, pushing the boundaries of the discipline and defining our standards of quality

**We would like you to have…*** 4+years of relevant UX experince (above internship) with design creation and delivery responsibility, research experience and a diverse portfolio.

* Excellent written and verbal communication skills

* A strong facilitator and presenter, able to build client confidence and push to make change happen
* Resilient with a calm and relaxed personality
* Someone with a ‘here to help’ attitude, who absolutely, fundamentally believes that we’re better together

title: Wavespace-Experience Designer - Senior Associate
description:
At EY, you’ll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are, with the global scale, support, inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you. And we’re counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better, too. Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself, and a better working world for all.

 **EY Wavespace: Experience Designer / Senior Associate**  

**The opportunity**  

We are looking for an Experience Designer for EY wavespace team  

EY wavespace is about people and business outcomes. We design immersive programs that bring the right people together, giving them the mindset and collaborative tools to think differently. These days we are doing this both virtually and in-person for clients around the world.

 **Responsibilities:**

* Design and produce digital content and branded materials that support interactive sessions
* Working with the Experience Leader/Manager, define strategy and design for customer experience, working closely with the Experience team to devise strategic solutions based on multiple forms and research and analysis
* Support clients in the use of collaboration software being used in the client experience
* Offer ideas on how to approach client challenges including industry trends and user experience
* Communicate complex technical concepts simply and effectively to all audiences using sketches, storytelling, mood boards/storyboards, wireframes, user flows, interactive prototypes, and/or data visualizations
* Take a collaborative approach to work, with motivation to develop your skills by taking ownership of new challenges and have a genuine interest in solving complex business problems
* Help lead workshops with clients to understand needs, articulate vision, and support design strategies and experiences that meet their vision and needs

 **Skills and attributes for success**

* Experience using Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator and various collaboration software including Mural, Miro, white board etc.
* Skills to Visualize, draw, create meaningful documents, presentations etc.
* Experience with photography and video production
* Ability to live-scribe / sketchnote
* Understanding of design thinking approach and working on agile teams

 **Ideally, you’ll also have**

* Advanced degree preferred, 7+ years professional experience in User Experience Design/ Product Design, or Visual Design.
* Past experience in consulting, CX Practice in a Fortune 500 firm, or agency in a media management or digital creative experience in a client facing role.
* Cross-functional experience working with both internal and 3rd party development teams and project management experience working with both creative agencies, brands or in a consulting capacity. Experience interfacing with clients and Rich Media Vendors.
* Advanced knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite, Axure, Mural, InVision, Keynote, OmniGraffle, Sketch or other design technologies.

 **EY | Building a better working world**

  



EY exists to build a better working world, helping to create long-term value for clients, people and society and build trust in the capital markets.

  



Enabled by data and technology, diverse EY teams in over 150 countries provide trust through assurance and help clients grow, transform and operate.

  

Working across assurance, consulting, law, strategy, tax and transactions, EY teams ask better questions to find new answers for the complex issues facing our world today.

title: Designer Team Lead
description:
**Job Description – Designer**

**Job brief**

We are looking for a graphic designer to create engaging and on-brand graphics for a variety of media.

What is the role of a graphic designer?

The graphic designer job description includes the entire process of defining requirements, visualizing and creating graphics including UI & UX, illustrations, logos, layouts and photos. You’ll be the one to shape the visual aspects of branding, websites, social media pages, software, product packaging and more.

Your graphics should capture the attention of those who see them and communicate the right message. For this, you need to have a creative flair and a strong ability to translate requirements into design. If you can communicate well and work methodically as part of a team, we’d like to meet you.

The goal is to inspire and attract the target audience.

**Responsibilities**

· Study design briefs and determine requirements

· Schedule projects and define budget constraints

· Conceptualize visuals based on requirements

· Prepare rough drafts and present ideas

· Develop UI & UX designs, illustrations, logos and other designs using software or by hand

· Use the appropriate colors and layouts for each graphic

· Work with copywriters and creative director to produce final design

· Test graphics across various media

· Amend designs after feedback

· Ensure final graphics and layouts are visually appealing and on-brand

**Requirements**

· Proven graphic designing experience

title: Senior Analyst - Instructional Design

**What you’ll do:**
-------------------



This is an individual contributor role. The Instructional Designer plays a pivotal role in creating engaging and effective instructional materials, courses, and eLearning content. The instructional designer will be responsible for designing and implementing instructional strategies, creating and developing effective learning experiences, utilize sound instructional methods to enhance knowledge acquisition and skills development.  

1. Needs Analysis: Conduct thorough analyses to identify the learning needs and goals of target audience.  

2. Instructional Strategies: Develop and implement instructional strategies, methodologies and delivery methods that align with learning goals, audience description and Eaton’s style guide.  

3. Assessment and Evaluation: Create assessments and evaluation methods to measure the effectiveness of instructional materials and modify content as needed.  

4. Curriculum Development: Using authoring tools, design and develop instructional content, including courses, modules, and learning materials, based on established learning objectives.  

5. Multimedia Development: Integrate multimedia elements, such as graphics, animations, and videos, to enhance the visual and interactive aspects of learning materials.  

6. Learning Platforms: Familiarity with Learning Management Systems (LMS) to deliver and manage content.  

7. Feedback and Iteration: Collect feedback from learners and stakeholders to continuously improve instructional content and delivery methods.  

8. Work Management: Independently manage instructional design projects, including timelines, efforts and resources, ensuring timely and quality delivery. Reviews will be conducted at critical points during project.

**Qualifications:**
-------------------


* Bachelor’s or master’s degree in Instructional Design, English, communication or a related field.
* Experience – 5-8 years.
**Skills:**
-----------


* Proven experience in instructional design, storyboarding and curriculum development.
* Proficiency in eLearning authoring tools and multimedia software like Rise 360, Storyline 360, Captivate and Camtasia.
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
* Knowledge of adult learning principles and instructional design models (e.g., SAM).
* Strong project management skills.
* Attention to detail and ability to work efficiently under deadlines.
* Good learner who keeps abreast with learning technology trends, instructional design methodologies, and best practices to continually enhance skills and knowledge.
* Experience of working in global teams.
